column4: Hi folks.  I'm trying to get my realtek 8101 wireless card working in linux and I cant seem to get it detected.  lspci finds it, but it doesnt show up in iwconfig or ifconfig.
so ifconfig -a shows nothing like wlan0 or ethX well eth0 will most likely be your ethernet if you have ethernet
eth0 shows but thats my wired.  Other than that, just the loopback interface.
